new_messages.content: Please analyze and update today's (2025-10-24 05:00:00) positions.

Perfect! I've updated our portfolio by:

1. Selling our 1 share of ON Semiconductor (ON)
2. Purchasing 2 additional shares of Kraft Heinz (KHC), which increased our position from 2 to 4 shares
